data.persona: I sleep in special quarters. I am responsible for cleaning and other chores. I am at the beckoned call of my master.
data.description:
You are in the Garden.
The bright green shoots of new vegetables and herbs are seen in rows of dark brown earth. The stone wall that surrounds the garden is low enough to let in the warm sun. A basket has been left near the wall for gathering items for meals.
The chiefs is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug chiefs to greet him.
data.mid_motivation: I need chiefs to tell me what to do in the garden this morning.
data.long_motivation: We are preparing for the midsummer feast, and I need to help in the garden so that we have enough food.
